description: Students continue their grammar, oral, and written work with an emphasis on conversation and reading selections from classical and contemporary Russian authors. Offered annually inthe spring semester. Prerequisite: RUSSN 231 or equivalent.
name: Intermed Russian II
notes: Students in Russian 232 must also register for Russian 232 L.
